service.name: Archive Storage
service.tagline: Back-up your data for the long term and future use in a secure environment
service.description: Archive Storage allows you to store large amounts of data in a secure environment freeing up your usual online storage resources. The data on the Archive Storage can be replicated across several storage sites, thanks to the adoption of interoperable open standards. The service is optimised for infrequent access. Main characteristics: store data for long-term retention, store large amount of data, free up your online storage.
service.userValue: Make disaster recovery possible, free up your online storage.
service.userBase: Virtual organisations: cms, lhcb, atlas, ams02.cern.ch, vo.cta.in2p3.fr, argo, vo.agata.org, magic, virgo, pamela, theophys, icarus-exp.org, vo.padme.org
service.funding: Development: EC H2020 projects (primarily) and national projects/open source projects. Operations: capacity supported by national funding, federation and support co-funded between national funding and EC H2020 projects
